pokemonData.name: Pikachu
pokemonData.description: Pikachu is a yellow, mouse-like creature with electrical abilities.

pokemonData.name: Eevee
pokemonData.description: It has the ability to alter the composition of its body to suit its surrounding environment.

pokemonData.name: Squirtle
pokemonData.description: When it retracts its long neck into its shell, it squirts out water with vigorous force.

pokemonData.name: Bulbasaur
pokemonData.description: There is a plant seed on its back right from the day this Pok√©mon is born. The seed slowly grows larger.
